law.catch_line: If a licensee changes the place of business, the licensee immediately shall notify the Commissioner ...

text.section: If a licensee changes the place of business, the licensee immediately shall notify the Commissioner in writing of the change.

section.section: On receiving notice under this section, the Commissioner, without charge, shall send the licensee an endorsement stating the change and its date.
The licensee shall attach the endorsement to the license.
